config.description:
A template for listing contributors of note on the main layout of an entity.
Contained within the `MAIN` layout.

prop.name: background
prop.description: The background gradient to use for this template. Affects presentation.

prop.name: filter
prop.description: Filter which contributors may appear based on their contribution role.

prop.name: limit
prop.description: Limit the number of contributors for this template.
